about_the_game:
In "Project: G-216, you are responsible for monitoring various cursed locations around the world. You will monitor surveillance camera feeds and have to react quickly to any anomalies. Don't let too many come together - it could cost your life.

Exploration

Discover cursed places and their secrets. Find all the anomalies and collect rewards.

Find all anomalies

A lot can happen in haunted places. Some things disappear, others appear. Circumstances can change at any time. You must always remain vigilant.

  • Objects can be moved, rotated and even scaled
  • Things are Added and Removed
  • Some objects can change color, shape and other attibutes
  • Cameras can be changed in order, position or even disappear
  • Did you watch the clock? Strange...

name: Project: G-216

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Processor
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
